name: Client Representation
description: The Housing Equality Law Project (HELP) assists people who believe they have been discriminated while applying for housing, or in their current housing situation by offering the following services: - Investigation of housing discrimination claims - Counseling clients on their rights - Creating individualized action plans aimed at achieving goals - Mediation and representation in administrative hearings, when available
